root: ^Hey, my jokes are pretty good, right Edrick?
^It wasn't that funny. You need to focus on the task ahead.

c-0: ^HAHAHA! I knew you'd get it! Dawnkeeper humor is UNIVERSAL! Too bad Yael is too much of a sour sack to even smile.
c-1: ^You and Yael will get along so well then. Times are hard, laugh a little! It's not like anyone's around to judge you. And you're dead, so it would be mean of them.
c-2: ^That's because I'm a comedic genius, you were predestined to laugh.
